me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.geometry

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.geometry.Circle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Shape<Circle>

    public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape<Circle>
    Among everyone's favorite things in the world, is, of course, the circle! What's not to love about a classic circle? I mean, come on, they're pretty cool, you have to admit.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson

        Resize the shape.
        Specified by:
        scale in interface Shape<Circle>
        Parameters:
        scale - the new scale for the shape. If this number is 2, the shape will double in size. If this number is 0.5, the shape will be half the original size.

        the scaled shape.
